Test Name: Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA) Diagnostic Assay, Deletion/Duplication Analysis
Purpose: To detect deletions or duplications in the SMN1 and SMN2 genes for the diagnosis of Spinal Muscular Atrophy.
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, MLPA or qPCR kits, electrophoresis system, qPCR instrument, DNA quantification apparatus
